column4: Can someone tell me where I can find my xorg.conf file? I can't find it in /etc/X11/ - I'm using the latest version of Ubuntu

ok - I'm having trouble with my Intel 945 graphics and a fix recommends running a command to create the file: $ sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg - but still the file does not exist. how can i configure my xorg without a conf?
